meanings.definition: Small-scale climates within a larger area.
meanings.sent1: Different parts of the garden have unique microclimates.
meanings.sent2: The desert oasis has its own microclimates.
meanings.sent3: The tiny greenhouse had more microclimates than the big city!
meanings.sent4: In the forest, each tree creates its own microclimates.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the mountain revealed diverse microclimates.

meanings.definition: The climate of a small, specific location.
meanings.sent1: The microclimates in the park vary from sunny to shady.
meanings.sent2: The rooftop garden has different microclimates on each level.
meanings.sent3: The picnic spot had unexpected microclimates for the ants.
meanings.sent4: Her backyard was a tapestry of microclimates waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The beach cove sheltered unique microclimates for the crabs.
